insurance_policies.title: Damage to or Loss of Vehicle
insurance_policies.description: Covers accidental damage, theft, fire, and other external perils.

insurance_policies.title: Liability to Third Parties
insurance_policies.description: Provides coverage for third-party bodily injury and property damage.

insurance_policies.title: Medical Expenses (Applicable to Private Cars Only)
insurance_policies.description: Covers medical costs for the insured and passengers in case of an accident.

insurance_policies.title: Personal Accident Benefits
insurance_policies.description: Offers compensation for injury, disability, or death due to an accident.

insurance_policies.title: Learner Driver/Rider Extension
insurance_policies.description: Covers vehicles driven by learner drivers under specific conditions.

insurance_policies.title: Airbag Extension
insurance_policies.description: Covers the cost of replacing airbags under specific conditions.

insurance_policies.title: Strike, Riot, and Civil Commotion Endorsement
insurance_policies.description: Extends coverage to include damage caused by strikes, riots, or civil disturbances.

insurance_policies.title: Terrorism Cover
insurance_policies.description: Provides compensation for losses due to terrorist activities.

insurance_policies.title: Driving Tuition Clause
insurance_policies.description: Extends coverage to vehicles used for driving lessons.

insurance_policies.title: Hire Vehicles - Hirer Driving
insurance_policies.description: Covers vehicles hired out to third parties, with exclusions for theft or conversion by the hirer.

insurance_policies.title: Duty-Free Vehicles
insurance_policies.description: Excludes local customs duty in case of repairs or replacement of parts.

insurance_policies.title: Passenger Indemnity (Ambulance & Hearses)
insurance_policies.description: Covers passenger liabilities for specific vehicle types.

insurance_policies.title: Special Type Clauses
insurance_policies.description: Includes working risk exclusions for vehicles used as trade tools.

insurance_policies.title: Breakage of Glass/Windscreen Extension
insurance_policies.description: Covers the cost of replacing broken vehicle windows without affecting the no-claim bonus.

insurance_policies.title: Third-Party Property Damage
insurance_policies.description: Provides coverage for damage to third-party property.

insurance_policies.title: Flood and Natural Disaster Coverage
insurance_policies.description: Covers damage caused by floods and other natural disasters.

insurance_policies.title: Compulsory Excess Clause
insurance_policies.description: Specifies the insured’s out-of-pocket contribution per claim.

insurance_policies.title: No-Claim Bonus
insurance_policies.description: Rewards policyholders for claim-free periods with premium discounts.

insurance_policies.title: Omni Buses with Route Permits
insurance_policies.description: Covers liabilities related to carrying passengers on route-permitted buses.

insurance_policies.title: Towing Charges Coverage
insurance_policies.description: Covers expenses related to towing a damaged vehicle.

insurance_policies.title: Hybrid & Electrical Vehicle Coverage
insurance_policies.description: Includes special conditions for hybrid and electric vehicles.

insurance_policies.title: Workmen’s Compensation Coverage
insurance_policies.description: Covers liability for employees in case of an accident during vehicle operation.

insurance_policies.title: Cyber Attack Exclusion Clause
insurance_policies.description: Specifically excludes coverage for losses due to cyberattacks.

insurance_policies.title: Radioactive Contamination Exclusion
insurance_policies.description: Excludes coverage for damages caused by radiation or nuclear accidents.

insurance_policies.title: Goods-in-Transit Terrorism Coverage
insurance_policies.description: Covers damages or losses to goods being transported due to terrorist acts.

insurance_policies.title: Unspecified Trailers Coverage
insurance_policies.description: Provides insurance for trailers attached to insured vehicles.

insurance_policies.title: Exclusion of Losses from Trade Tools Use
insurance_policies.description: Specifically excludes losses when a vehicle is used as a tool of trade.

insurance_policies.title: Compulsory Excess for Older Vehicles
insurance_policies.description: Mandates higher excess payments for older vehicles.

insurance_policies.title: Passenger Indemnity for Ambulance & Hearses
insurance_policies.description: Covers specific liabilities for medical and funeral vehicles.

insurance_policies.title: Vehicle Battery and Electrical Damage
insurance_policies.description: Covers damages to vehicle batteries and inverters under certain conditions.
